page.title: 13F of D Berry Hill Family Day
page.content: Our day starts 7.00 am.For{breakfast we have{cereal,toast}and{coffee.Dad robes up for{Holy Communion}at {Christchurch}at 8.00 am.After the service we go to sing in the{choir}at {Coleford St Johns}church.Our Dad comes back to take morning prayer at 11 am, during which{sunday school}is held.We all have{dinner}together-this is usually{roast chicken,potatoes, {yorkshire pudding,peas,carrots.Pudding was{rice pudding}and{pears.In}the afternoon we went for a drive to {Cleddon Falls}and{Tintern Abbey.When we come back we watched a{video}and played{monopoly.For tea}we had{pizza and{current buns.Dad then went to take 6.00 pm evensong.Mum and my brother were in the{choir.We}spent some time playing{lego}then went to bed at 7.30 pm.
